00064 struct block_header
00065 {
00066     typedef detail::atomic_count count_type;
00067 
00068     count_type count_;                                                          
00069     mutable block_header * redir_;                                      
00071         bool destroy_;                                                                  
00072     intrusive_list::node tag_;                                          
00074     intrusive_list includes_;                                           
00075     intrusive_list elements_;                                           
00077         static mutex & static_mutex()                                   
00078         {
00079                 static mutex mutex_;
00080                 
00081                 return mutex_;
00082         }
00083 
00084         static fast_pool_allocator<block_header> & static_pool() 
00085         {
00086         static fast_pool_allocator<block_header> pool_;
00087         
00088         return pool_;
00089     }
00090 
00095     block_header() : count_(1), redir_(this), destroy_(false)
00096     {
00097         includes_.push_back(& tag_);
00098     }
00099 
00100         
00107     bool release()
00108     {
00109         if (-- count_ == 0)
00110         {
00111                         destroy_ = true;
00112                         
00113             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::block_tag_> i; i = elements_.begin(), i != elements_.end(); )
00114                 delete &* i;
00115                 
00116                         destroy_ = false;
00117             
00118             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_header, & block_header::tag_> i = includes_.begin(), j; j = i, i != includes_.end(); i = j)
00119                         { 
00120                                 ++ j;
00121                                 
00122                 if (&* i != this)
00123                     delete &* i;
00124                         }
00125 
00126             return true;
00127         }
00128 
00129         return false;
00130     }
00131 
00132         
00139     block_header * redir() const
00140     {
00141         while (redir_ != redir_->redir_)
00142                 redir_ = redir_->redir_;
00143         
00144         return redir_;
00145     }
00146         
00147         
00154     void redir(block_header * p)
00155     {
00156         if (redir_ != p)
00157         {
00158             redir_ = p;
00159             redir_->includes_.merge(includes_);
00160             redir_->elements_.merge(elements_);
00161             new (& redir_->count_) count_type(redir_->count_ + count_); 
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00165         
00173     void * operator new (size_t s)
00174     {
00175         return static_pool().allocate(s);
00176     }
00177     
00178         
00187     void * operator new (size_t s, block_header * p)
00188     {
00189         return p;
00190     }
00191 
00192         
00199     void operator delete (void * p)
00200     {
00201         static_pool().deallocate(static_cast<block_header *>(p), sizeof(block_header));
00202     }
00203 };

00206 #define TEMPLATE_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) typename T ## n
00207 #define ARGUMENT_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) T ## n const & t ## n
00208 #define PARAMETER_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) t ## n
00209 
00210 #define BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                         \
00211         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00212                 friend block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0));
00213 
00214 #define CONSTRUCT_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                            \
00215         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00216                 block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0))                                                                                                                 \
00217                 {                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00218                         return block_ptr<V>(new block<V>(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, PARAMETER_DECL, 0)));                                                                       \
00219                 }

00228 template <typename T>
00229     class block_ptr : public block_ptr_base<T>
00230     {
00231         template <typename> friend class block_ptr;
00232 
00233         typedef block_ptr_base<T> base;
00234         
00235         using base::share;
00236                 using base::po_;
00237 
00238         union
00239         {
00240             block_header * ps_;                                         
00241             intrusive_stack::node pn_;                          
00242         };
00243 
00244 #ifdef BOOST_BP_USE_RAW_POINTER
00245         public:
00246 #endif
00247 
00253         template <typename V>
00254             block_ptr(block<V> * p) : base(p)
00255             {
00256                 if (! pool::is_from(this))
00257                 {
00258                     ps_ = new block_header();
00259 
00260                     init(p);
00261                 }
00262                 else
00263                 {
00264                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00265                     pool::top(this)->inits_.merge(p->inits_);
00266                 }
00267             }
00268 
00269                 
00276         template <typename V>
00277             block_ptr & operator = (block<V> * p)
00278             {
00279 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00280                         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::static_mutex());
00281 #endif
00282 
00283                 release(false);
00284 
00285                 init(p);
00286 
00287                 base::operator = (p);
00288 
00289                 return * this;
00290             }
00291 
00292         template <typename V>
00293                 void reset(block<V> * p)
00294                 {
00295                     operator = <T>(p);
00296                 }
00297             
00298                 template <typename V>
00299                         friend block_ptr<V> make_block();
00300 
00301                 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(1, 10, BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK, make_block)
00302 
00303     public:
00304         typedef T                       value_type;
00305         typedef block<value_type>     element_type;
00306 
00307 
00312         block_ptr() : ps_(0)
00313         {
00314             if (! pool::is_from(this))
00315                 ps_ = new block_header();
00316             else
00317                 pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00318         }

00330                 if (! pool::is_from(this))
00331                     ps_ = new block_header();
00332                 else
00333                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00334 
00335                 ps_->redir()->redir(p.ps_->redir());
00336             }

00362         template <typename V>
00363             block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<V> const & p)
00364             {
00365 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00366                         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::static_mutex());
00367 #endif
00368 
00369                 if (ps_->redir() != p.ps_->redir())
00370                 {
00371                     release(false);
00372                                         
00373                         ps_->redir()->redir(p.ps_->redir());
00374                 }
00375                 base::operator = (p);
00376 
00377                 return * this;
00378             }

00388         {
00389             return operator = <T>(p);

00392         void reset()
00393         {
00394 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00395                 mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::static_mutex());
00396 #endif
00397 
00398             release(false);
00399         }
00400         
00401         template <typename V>
00402                 void reset(block_ptr<V> const & p)
00403                 {
00404                     operator = <T>(p);
00405                 }
00406         
00407         bool cyclic() const
00408         {
00409                 return ps_->redir()->destroy_;
00410         }
00411 
00412         ~block_ptr()
00413         {
00414                         if (cyclic())
00415                                 base::po_ = 0;
00416                         else
00417                                 release(true);
00418         }
00419 
00420     private:
00427         void release(bool d)
00428         {
00429             base::reset();
00430             
00431             if (! pool::is_from(this))
00432             {
00433                         block_header * p = ps_->redir();
00434         
00435                 if (p->release())
00436                     if (! d)
00437                     {
00438                         p->~block_header();
00439                         ps_ = new (p) block_header();
00440                     }
00441                     else
00442                         delete p;
00443                 else 
00444                                         if (! d)
00445                         ps_ = new block_header();
00446             }
00447         }
00448 
00449                 
00456         void init(block_base * p)
00457         {
00458             if (p->init_)
00459                 return;
00460 
00461                 block_header * q = ps_->redir();
00462         
00463                         // iterate memory blocks
00464             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::init_tag_> i = p->inits_.begin(); i != p->inits_.end(); ++ i)
00465             {
00466                 i->init_ = true;
00467                 q->elements_.push_back(& i->block_tag_);
00468 
00469                                 // iterate block_ptr elements
00470                 for (intrusive_stack::iterator<block_ptr, & block_ptr::pn_> j = i->ptrs_.begin(), k; k = j, j != i->ptrs_.end(); j = k)
00471                                 {
00472                                         ++ k;
00473                     j->ps_ = ps_;
00474                                 }
00475             }
00476         }
00477 
00478         public:
00479 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_RVALUE_REFS)
00480         block_ptr(block_ptr<T> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00481         {
00482         }
00483 
00484         template<class Y>
00485                 block_ptr(block_ptr<Y> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00486                 {
00487                 }
00488 
00489         block_ptr<T> & operator = (block_ptr<T> && p)
00490         {
00491                 po_ = std::move(p.po_);
00492                 ps_ = std::move(p.ps_);
00493                 
00494                 return *this;
00495         }

00498                 block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<Y> && p)
00499                 {
00500                         po_ = std::move(p.po_);
00501                         ps_ = std::move(p.ps_);
00502                         
00503                         return *this;

00508 template <typename V>
00509         block_ptr<V> make_block()
00510         {
00511                 return block_ptr<V>(new block<V>());
